Termitron:

Termitron was fightting widly to defend his colony and his Queen. He 
avoided most of the shots of his enemies and in spite of some of them 
struck him, he ignored them; he was decided to fight until his death.

He fired 5 times against Mcgowan, 5 against Stiller, 5 times agains 
Alba, 5 times against Barrymore and other 5 against Depp
